name: Quest System
description:
A tiny, and I do mean tiny, showcase of my quest system.  It's a flexible script I created that can handle multiple quests, making it extremely customizable.  I put in as many things as I could think of: 

-If you don't have the quest active, you can't pick up the quest item

-If you accept the quest but don't complete it, the NPC will react

-Accepting the quest will add it to your "active quests" list

-After the quest is completed, NPC dialogue permanently changes

That's all!
